title: Bluedot Trading 1200 Piece Tie Dye Rubber Band Loom Band Set and 50 Clear S-Clips for Kids DIY Arts and Crafts, Rainbow Friendship Bracelet Refill Pack
features: Here’s what the kit includes: 1200 (2 bags of 600) latex-free opaque Tie Dye rubber bands that work with all major brand name looms and accessories. Also includes 50 (2 bags of 25) clear S-clips also known as Infinity clips to secure the bracelets with.
Latex Free: These are safe and non-toxic, free from latex, lead and phthalates. The rubber loom band has excellent performance on elasticity, softness and durability.
Unleash Your Creativity: These bands can be used to create bracelets, hair bands, charms, bag accessories, and other loom-related creations!

Stimulate Imagination: Creativity and imagination abounds while promoting parent-child relationships, allowing people to enjoy time together. It's great for birthday presents, Christmas, New Year, and Thanksgiving. Also an excellent choice for DIY enthusiasts.
*Not intended for children under the age of 3.
description: Bluedot Trading 1200 Piece Tie Dye Rubber Band Loom Band Set and 50 Clear S-Clips for Kids DIY Arts and Crafts, Rainbow Friendship Bracelet Refill Pack. Made of high-quality materials – safe for kids! All Loom Bands are made of silicon, free from latex, lead, and phthalates. A Great Creative Outlet for Kids! With an ample supply of both loom bands, this set will charge children’s imagination. There’s no end to the possibilities for unique creations! Also a Great Family Activity. Unleash Your Creativity – These bands can be used to create backpack hanging toys, bracelets, hair bands, charms, bag accessories, and other loom-related creations! Here’s what the kit includes: 1200 latex-free opaque Tie Dye rubber bands that work with all major brand name looms and accessories. Also includes two bags of 25 clear S-clips (also known as Infinity clips) to secure the bracelets with. *Not intended for children under the age of 3.
